stories.text:
I'm doing post-incorporation setup right now. We have four cofounders but haven't raised yet. Expect one spot at least on the board for the CEO, but there are still three others.

I see DoorDash has all three founders on the board. But I've also seen advice that too many founders is seen as a negative by investors.

Also, if we haven't incorporated yet, should we? We were thinking of doing it with the investor's help only once we raised funding.
stories.title: How many cofounders on board of directors?

stories.text:
My daughter is the only one in the house with an Apple phone or watch. She needs a reminder alarm to tell her to take first up meds in the morning, but wakes up at different times.

I searched a bit, but couldn't come up with anything obvious, is it possible to have a reminder alarm on the watch set for ten minutes after it thinks you have woken up?
stories.title: How To? Apple Watch Reminder Alarm Only After Wake Up
